A guy planted two potatoes in an Amazon shipping box to prove a point. Mission accomplished.
s: Gardener James Prigioni shared an experiment in which he planted two Amazon cardboard boxes with two different varieties of potatoes to see how well they would grow and if they would hold up. He wanted to show people that you don't have to spend a lot of money or have a lot of space to garden.

t: Potato Antitrust | FeganScott
s: November 26, 2024 - In November 2024, FeganScott filed a class action lawsuit alleging that, since at least January 2021, the top potato processors in the United States operated an unlawful anticompetitive scheme that allowed them to drive up the price of frozen potato products.
